includes.expression: String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(platform),Atari Lynx) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(platform),Microsoft Windows) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(platform),NEC TurboGrafx CD) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(platform),Nintendo GameBoy) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(platform),Nintendo GameBoy Advance) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(platform),Nintendo GameBoy Color) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(platform),Sega Dreamcast) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(platform),Sega MegaCD) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(platform),Sega SegaCD) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(platform),Sony PlayStation)

[String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(platform),Atari Lynx) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(platform),Microsoft Windows) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(platform),NEC TurboGrafx CD) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(platform),Nintendo 3DS) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(platform),Nintendo 64) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(platform),Nintendo DS) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(platform),Nintendo GameBoy) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(platform),Nintendo GameBoy Advance) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(platform),Nintendo GameBoy Color) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(platform),Nintendo SNES) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(platform),Nintendo Switch) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(platform),Sega Dreamcast) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(platform),Sega MegaCD) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(platform),Sega SegaCD) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(platform),Sony PlayStation) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(platform),Sony PlayStation 3) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(platform),Sony PlayStation Portable) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(platform),Sony PlayStation Vita)]
